global.loginWithDiscordDesc: You need to log in with Discord. Due to recent changes, it's now more difficult to access mutual guilds without being logged in. Please click the login button to continue or [here](https://supportmail.dev/api/login).
global.reportToDeveloper: Please report this issue to the [developer](https://discord.gg/rFkVQx3vpj).

errors.tokenRevocationError:
### ❌ There has been a token revocation error.
Please notify the bot support.

tickets.selectServerDesc: Select a server where you want to continue in an open ticket or create a new one.
tickets.blacklistedDesc: -# You can't create new tickets in this server.
tickets.modmailExplanation: What is Modmail? Click here to learn more.

commands.currentlyNotLoggedIn: ### ❌ You are currently not logged in.
commands.anonymConfigEnabled: Users will see the alias **`{alias}`** when they get a response.
commands.anonymConfigDataDisabled: Users will see the team member who has replied in their ticket.

tips.turnOffTips: -# Did you know that you can turn off tips by using {command:preferences tips}?
tips.premiumRequired: You need SupportMail Premium to do this!
